data.description:
Pro Shooter VR is the world’s first Olympic-style shooting sports game in VR. Challenge yourself in a shooting simulation like never before!


{1200767661304591}


# EXPERIENCE REALISTIC PRECISION SHOOTING FOR THE FIRST TIME IN VR
Focus, aim, and make every shot count! Test your endurance, accuracy, and mental resilience.



# **PLAY OLYMPIC-STYLE SHOOTING SPORTS**
Experience what it's like to be a shooting athlete in 10m Air Rifle, 10m Air Pistol, and 25m Rapid Fire.


{477713834767751}


# MODIFY DIFFICULTY
Whether you are a professional in the sport or an amateur playing for the first time, we have difficulty modes tailor-made for you to enjoy.


# PLAY ACROSS MULTIPLE RANGES
Participate in a wide variety of shooting ranges and game events.


{1248741349423793}


# PRACTICE FOR EXCELLENCE
Improve your gameplay with in-game tutorial videos and practice ranges.


{1699767637224638}


Don't miss out on this chance to test your shooting skills and dominate the competition!

changelog.change_log:
Friday  Dec 8, 2023
New Practice and Match Ranges
Added separate ranges for practice mode and match mode for 10m. Air pistol and 10m air rifle mode
Improved lighting and general graphics in all existing ranges
Note from developer
The previous ranges had only gameplay essential assets. We have now added some more props for decoration to make the range feel less empty.

User Experience and Feedback for players
- Added new shot score pop-up in all game modes
- Added new sounds for shot feedback in all game modes
Note from developer
Players will now see a shot score pop-up right above the target after the shot is complete. This helps players with follow-through of a shot and understand the shot score, without getting out of shooting position
-Added Action prompt labels 
Note from developer
We have added new labels at every step for players to understand the shooting mechanic properly. This can be enabled/disabled from main menu settings anytime
- Grip Settings (BETA)
- Added Grip adjustment settings in the game. 
Note from developer
Players will now be able to adjust their grip on the air pistol. The setting will allow players to move the weapon up or down depending on their grip on the weapon.

V1.2
─
UI Overhaul
- NEW UI has been added in Main menu, Burger menu and All the game modes.
- NEW UI for End Game pop session summary.
Note from developer
The new UI Elements are more graphical than textual, targeted to give shooters better understanding of their performance.
New Game Mode
- Added 25m Rapid Fire game event
Note from developer
Rapid fire is a precise and highly competitive event in Shooting sports. Players can now experience the Rapid fire in Pro shooter VR

Miscellaneous
- Added New Skybox in Main Menu Hub
- Added Music player with controls in Main Menu Hub
- Added 5 new soundtracks in the game.
